page.title: 07A WEEKDAY.
page.content: On a weekday we go to school.School starts at 9.00a.m.At 10.30a.m. we have playtime till 10.45a.m.Dinner time is 12.00p.m.till 1.00p.m.The next playtime is at 2.20p.m.till 2.30p.m.School ends at 3.30p.m.When children get home they usually watch television or play with friends.Most people have their tea at about 6.00p.m.School weeks last five days.On Friday nights there are Scouts.On Tuesday nights there are Guides.On a Monday there are Brownies.On Friday nights in the church there is Bellringing and also flower arranging.Half-Day closing is on a Wednesday.On that day Coleys are open all day.But Parkers is only open in the morning.Mrs Milson runs a playgroup in the mornings.
